We\u00E2\u0080\u0099ll need to ask more questions to understand your situation.
Have you been to crowed places like supermarket, big store etc.?
Questions about recent exposure, field of employment (if medical or not) and residential arrangement(care facility, nursing homes, etc)
This app works best when enabling location and bluetooth access at all times.
With location data, it detects places where people gather & highlights you the risk area near you
Based on your reported symptoms, you should seek care immediately.
We sugguest you to book a test appointment.
Here is a list of hospitals near you
Enable Location access, permission to send Exposure Notifications
Allow us to send exposure and push notifications
Share the app with friends & family, create a safe community
We are a group of volunteers from all over the world who have worked together on the Safe.t project in the past few months.
Check out our project website to learn more about our projects.

The Safe.t project to proactively prevent the spread of COVID-19 while preserving privacy.\nProviding exposure alerts to citizens with accurate information & guidelines.\nTracking of symptom progression and identification of asymptomatic + presymptomatic cases.
You will answer a few questions about symptoms, travel and contact you have had with others.
"Your answers will not be shared with any 3rd parties without your permission. "
By using this tool, you agree to its terms and that the app will not be liable for any harm relating to your use.
Recommendations provided are merely health suggestions, and should not be considered formal medical advice. All users who exhibit symptoms should consult a licensed doctor for further consultation.
Based on your reported symptoms, you should seek care immediately.
Based on your reported symptoms, your risk is low.
Share your symptom checker results with friends & family
We suggest you to book an appointment.
